CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 4, 1964, pg. 7, reads: "The Knotts Entertain - Dr. and Mrs. A. Paul Knott (left) of Pittsburgh entertained recently for their son and his bride, the former Miss Leila Forsell of Sweden. Dr. and Mrs. Albert Paul Jr. are shown center, while her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Carl Eric Forsell, are shown on the far right.  The lawn reception was held at Rosewood, the home of the Knotts. - Harris Photo."  Portions of accompanying article read: ..."The Knotts were married April 4, in Thorndike Hilton Chapel, University of Chicago.  Dr. Knott Jr., a graduate of Yale University and Seaton Hall College of Medicine, was a Fellow under Dr. Louis Katz, world famous cardiologist, at the Heart Institute, Michael Reese hospital, Chicago, 1961-'63.  Presently he is chief of electrocardiology at Edwards Hines Veteran's Hospital...  The very beautiful bride was born in Malmo, Sweden.  She is a physiologist at Loyola Medical School.  Her professional training was all done in Europe.  She holds a master's degree in bio-chemistry and mathematics, and speaks fluent English, German and Swedish, and is an accomplished musician..."
TitMainTitle: Dr. Albert Paul Knott, Mrs. Knott, groom Dr. Albert Paul Knott Jr., bride Leila Forsell Knott, Mrs. Forsell, and Carl Eric Forsell, posed on lawn of Knott's estate Rosewood
